title: Zoku - Kindan No Koi Wo Shiyou
alternative_title: 続・禁断の恋をしよう ; Let's Make Forbidden Love, Continued
status: 続・禁断の恋をしよう ; Let's Make Forbidden Love, Continued
description:
Description :
        A manga about werewolves and the continued adventures of Hisako and Yato.This volume falls between the prequel volume, Kindan no Koi wo Shiyou (http://mangapark.com/search?q=kindan-no-koi-wo-shiyou), and the longer main series, Kindan no Koi de Ikou (http://mangapark.com/search?q=kindan-no-koi-de-ikou).

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3 : Can't Tell From Day To Night
Vol.1 Chapter 2 : Beauty Under The Moon
